segments.text: Observing this indoor kitchen, it's daytime with light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman faces the sink area, holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy on a stool reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks precarious, wobbling back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up, expecting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking behind the woman's back, so bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is serene, unexpectedly calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hidden chaos in this setup.
segments.speaker: PAR
